articles.author: Michelle Butterfield
articles.title: Madonna world tour: Greatest-hits show to stop in 3 Canadian cities | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: Madonna is heading back out on tour, this time performing her greatest hits around North America and Europe.
articles.content:
NOTE: Videos in this post contain strong language and mature content. Please watch at your own discretion.
Madonna has announced a new, greatest-hits world tour and her first stop will be in Canada.… [+1777 chars]
